name: Samurai Suit X
description:
Samurai Suit X is a Hack n Slash single player game that tells the story of a modern samurai against the future AI. The platform used is PC, but it does not rule out root to the mobile platform.

A samurai invades a temple to get revenge on the robots who destroyed his village. He seeks to destroy each boss on each level until he finally reaches the controller of all robots to save other villages from the robot invasion.
